QOS policy is not set to drop the packet

choices.A: The call will get through via the WAN. but it will experience poor audio quality.
choices.D: The call will get through without any issues.

choices.D: The gateway can be added either as an H.323 gateway or Cisco 3800 series router.
choices.C: Cisco 3800 series router. The specific model will be selected after the Cisco 3800 is selected.
choices.E: The gateway can be added either as an H.323 gateway or Cisco 3825 series router. A

questions.question_text: A Cisco 3825 needs to be added in Cisco Unified Communications Manager as an H.323 gateway. What should the gateway type be?

discussion.content: Correct answer A., E. is wrong because if you select Cisco 3825 router we will be using MGCP or SCCP only not H.323

choices.C: Calling number localization is done by configuring a calling party transformation CSS at the phone.
choices.A: Calling number localization is done using translation patterns.
choices.B: Calling number localization is done using route patterns.
choices.D: Calling number localization is done by configuring a calling party transformation CSS at the gateway.
choices.E: Calling number localization is done by configuring the phone directory number in a localized format.
